channel_id.description: the channel id of the channel to take funds from

amount.description: a positive amount of satoshis to be taken from the channel

initialpsbt.description: the (optional) base 64 encoded PSBT to begin with. If not specified, one will be generated automatically

feerate_per_kw.description: the miner fee we will pay from our channel funds. It is calculated by `feerate_per_kw` * our_bytes_in_splice_tx / 1000

force_feerate.description: by default splices will fail if the fee provided looks too high. This is to protect against accidentally setting your fee higher than intended. Set `force_feerate` to true to skip this saftey check

locktime.description: the locktime to use if initialpsbt is not specified.

sign_first.description: offer to our peer to sign the splice first.
